table.name: vtiger_scininstallations
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_scininstallations` ( `scininstallationsid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `edf_pagecode` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `name` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `asn_pagecode` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `datemiseenservice` DATE DEFAULT NULL, `areva_pagecode` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `scintypeinstallation` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `scinetatinstallation` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `zip` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `city` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`scininstallationsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_scininstallationscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_scininstallationscf` ( `scininstallationsid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`scininstallationsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
